text:
People aged 85 and over will be offered a free #COVID19 #vaccine next, starting from Monday (15 February). 

As soon as your vaccine is available, your GP will let you know. 

For more information ➡ https://t.co/GfsjF2YdyP 

#Longford #CovidVaccines #HoldFirm #VaccinesSaveLives https://t.co/cqVXWfHp2O
